mapper.insert: insert into sms_log (sms_id, req_id, sms_channl_id, sms_req_log, sms_rsp_log, req_time, rsp_time) values (#{smsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsChannlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsReqLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsRspLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rspTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select sms_id, req_id, sms_channl_id, sms_req_log, sms_rsp_log, req_time, rsp_time from sms_log
